titles: The Churches deliuerance contayning meditations and short notes vppon the booke of Hester. In remembrance of the wonderfull deliuerance from the Gunpoulder-treason. By Thomas Cooper.
author: Cooper, Thomas, fl. 1626.
publisher: Imprinted by G. Eld for T. Adams, and are to be sold at the white Lyon in Paules Church-yard,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
keywords: Bible. --  O.T. --  Esther --  Commentaries --  Early works to 1800.
